presentation.fsa
Class CircleNodeLayout

java.lang.Object
  presentation.GraphicalLayout
      presentation.fsa.CircleNodeLayout

public class CircleNodeLayout
extends GraphicalLayout

Graphical layout data required to display a circular node.

Author:
Helen Bretzke

          The default radius of the circle which represents this Node.

          Keeps track of the maximum radius over all nodes in the graph.
